result.eng: The secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ga: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.orig: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.html: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreachaThe secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an rúnaí gnóṫaċ ag scríoḃ litreaċaThe secretary was busy writing letters.

result.eng: Letters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ga: Bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.orig: Bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.html: Bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn moill ar litreaċa gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.

result.html: Ní scríobhaim litreacha go minicI don't write letters often.
result.ponchtml: Ní scríoḃaim litreaċa go minicI don't write letters often.
